title: All passwords known to PfP
recovery_code_explanation: Recovery codes securely encode a password and can be entered when adding a password. They are safe to print, decryption is only possible with the main password they have been protected with.
intro: This overview is safe to print as long as the passwords are not shown. In particular, recovery codes are only usable if the password is known that these have been protected with (typically your main password).
show_passwords_confirm: This will display all your passwords on screen, please only proceed if nobody can watch over your shoulder. This action might take some time to complete.
